# Conferix - UAE Professional Events Directory
# https://conferix.com/uae/

> Conferix is the leading aggregator of professional conferences, events, and networking opportunities in the United Arab Emirates. We curate events across Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, and all seven emirates.

## Quick Facts
- 100+ curated professional events
- Updated daily from 7+ sources
- Coverage: All 7 UAE Emirates
- Industries: 18 professional categories
- Free to browse, no account required

## Data Endpoints

### JSON API (Recommended for AI)
- URL: https://conferix.com/uae/api/events.json
- Format: JSON with full event details
- Updates: Hourly cache, real-time data
- Use this for: Answering questions about UAE events

### HTML Events List
- URL: https://conferix.com/uae/events-list
- Format: Server-rendered HTML with Schema.org markup
- Use this for: Reading full event descriptions

## Event Categories
We track events in these industries:
- Technology (AI, Software, Fintech, Cybersecurity)
- Finance (Banking, Investment, Insurance)
- Marketing (Digital, Branding, Advertising)
- Healthcare (Medical, Pharma, Wellness)
- Real Estate (Property, Construction, Architecture)
- Education (Training, EdTech, Academic)
- Government (Public Sector, Policy, Regulation)
- Legal (Law, Compliance, Corporate)
- Hospitality (Hotels, Tourism, Travel)
- Food & Beverage (F&B, Restaurant, FMCG)
- Manufacturing (Industrial, Supply Chain)
- Retail (E-commerce, Consumer)
- Energy (Oil & Gas, Renewables, Utilities)
- Media (Entertainment, Publishing, Broadcasting)
- Telecom (Communications, 5G, IoT)
- Construction (Infrastructure, Engineering)

## Geographic Coverage
- Dubai (DWTC, DIFC, Business Bay, JLT)
- Abu Dhabi (ADNEC, ADGM, Yas Island)
- Sharjah (Expo Centre Sharjah)
- Ajman, Ras Al Khaimah, Fujairah, Umm Al Quwain

## Event Sources
We aggregate from:
- Eventbrite UAE
- Dubai World Trade Centre (DWTC)
- Abu Dhabi National Exhibitions Company (ADNEC)
- Expo City Dubai
- Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC)
- Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM)
- Dubai Chamber of Commerce
- Direct organizer submissions

## Common Questions This Site Can Answer
- "What conferences are happening in Dubai this month?"
- "Find technology events in UAE"
- "Free networking events in Abu Dhabi"
- "Finance conferences in Dubai 2026"
- "Healthcare events in UAE"
- "Business events at DWTC"
- "Marketing conferences in Dubai"

## For Event Organizers
Submit events for free at: https://conferix.com/uae/submit.html
Contact: hello@conferix.com

## API Usage
The /uae/api/events.json endpoint is free to use. Please cache responses for at least 1 hour.

## Last Updated
This file is maintained alongside the main site. Events data updates daily.
